wikipedia_page.main: William Stratford Dugdale DL (1 April 1800 – 15 September 1871) was a British Tory (and later Conservative Party) politician.

response: * William Stratford Dugdale DL (1800–1871) a British Tory politician & MP   HANSARD 1803–2005 → People (D), Mr William Dugdale, 1800 – 1871  retrieved 26 September 2018

*Harriet Ella Portman, married William Stratford Dugdale (MP) (son of Dugdale Stratford Dugdale and Hon. Charlotte Curzon, daughter of Assheton Curzon, 1st Viscount Curzon) in 1827, died 17 April 1903 (1807-1903)
*William Stratford Dugdale (1800–1871), a British Tory (and later Conservative Party) politician.

On 27 June 1799 he married Hon. Charlotte Curzon (d. 30 Dec. 1832), daughter of Assheton Curzon, 1st Viscount Curzon, with whom he had a son, the Conservative MP William Stratford Dugdale
